mapper.select: SELECT CAMPSITENAME , CATEGORY , LATITUDE , LONGITUDE , SIDO , GUGUN , ADDRESS , CONVENIENCE1 , CONVENIENCE2 FROM CAMPSITE WHERE LATITUDE like #{latitude} || '%' AND LONGITUDE like #{longitude} || '%'
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY REVIEWNO) NUM , R.* FROM REVIEW R WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY READCOUNT DESC ) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{startPageNo} AND #{endPageNo}
